About CSSL

Committed to being the most reliable supplier in the shelving industry

Commercial Shelving and Solutions Limited is a supplier and distributor of industrial and commercial shelving in Trinidad and Tobago. Our thrust is concentrated on supplying solutions for offices, warehouses and industrial complexes throughout Trinidad and the Caribbean region

Our sales specialists have over 15 years of experience in the material handling industry. Their knowledge of the market and experience has seen the completion of many successful projects and satisfied customers.
